statements: SELECT * FROM WaterQualityData
SELECT station_id, timestamp FROM WaterQualityData WHERE pollutant_level > 5
SELECT pollutant_level, pollution_source FROM WaterQualityData WHERE station_id = 2
SELECT * FROM WaterQualityData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT AVG(pollutant_level) AS average_pollutant_level FROM WaterQualityData
SELECT * FROM WaterQualityData WHERE station_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT station_id, pollutant_level FROM WaterQualityData WHERE pollutant_level > 5 AND pollution_source = 'Factory' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT station_id, pollution_source FROM WaterQualityData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY station_id;
SELECT MAX(pollutant_level) AS highest_pollutant_level, AVG(pollutant_level) AS average_pollutant_level FROM WaterQualityData WHERE station_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records, MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp FROM WaterQualityData WHERE pollution_source != 'Unknown';
SELECT * FROM water_quality_data WHERE pollutant_name = 'Chlorine'
SELECT station_id, date, pollutant_name FROM water_quality_data ORDER BY pollutant_level DESC
SELECT AVG(pollutant_level) AS avg_level, pollutant_name FROM water_quality_data GROUP BY pollutant_name
SELECT station_name, location FROM monitoring_stations ORDER BY station_name ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM water_quality_data
SELECT station_id, date, pollutant_name, pollutant_level FROM water_quality_data WHERE pollutant_level > 5 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT station_name, location, monitoring_date FROM monitoring_stations WHERE monitoring_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY station_name ASC
SELECT station_id, station_name, location FROM monitoring_stations WHERE location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY station_name DESC
SELECT DISTINCT pollutant_name FROM water_quality_data ORDER BY pollutant_name ASC
SELECT station_id, station_name, location, monitoring_date FROM monitoring_stations WHERE station_id IN (1, 4, 7) ORDER BY location
SELECT * FROM station_data;
SELECT station_name, water_quality_reading FROM station_data WHERE water_quality_reading > 5;
SELECT station_name, location FROM station_data ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM pollution_sources WHERE pollution_level < 3;
SELECT source_name, location FROM pollution_sources WHERE source_type = 'Industrial';
SELECT station_name, location FROM station_data WHERE water_quality_reading > 5 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT source_name, pollution_level FROM pollution_sources WHERE pollution_level > 0.5 ORDER BY pollution_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01' AND pollution_type = 'chemical' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT station_name, location, water_quality_reading FROM station_data WHERE station_name LIKE 'A%' OR location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT source_name, location, pollution_level FROM pollution_sources WHERE source_type IN ('factory', 'industrial') ORDER BY location ASC, pollution_level DESC;
SELECT station_id, station_name, location FROM monitoring_stations;
SELECT * FROM water_quality_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM pollution_sources WHERE source_type = 'Industrial';
SELECT source_id, description FROM pollution_records WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT station_id, pollutant_type, pollutant_level FROM water_quality_data WHERE pollutant_type = 'Lead' ORDER BY pollutant_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM monitoring_stations WHERE station_name = 'Station A';
SELECT station_name, location FROM monitoring_stations ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT station_name, COUNT(*) FROM water_quality_data GROUP BY station_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT station_name, date, pollutant_type, pollutant_level FROM water_quality_data WHERE pollutant_level > 5.0 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT p.source_name, pr.date, pr.description FROM pollution_sources p JOIN pollution_records pr ON p.source_id = pr.source_id WHERE pr.date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM Monitoring_Station;
SELECT station_name, location_lat FROM Monitoring_Station ORDER BY station_name DESC;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM Pollution_Sources WHERE location_lat > 40;
SELECT data_id, ph_level, turbidity FROM Water_Quality_Data WHERE datetime > '2022-01-01' AND ph_level > 7;
SELECT impact_type, impact_description FROM Pollution_Impact JOIN Pollution_Sources ON Pollution_Impact.source_id = Pollution_Sources.source_id WHERE Pollution_Sources.source_name = 'Factory A';
SELECT * FROM Monitoring_Station ORDER BY station_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT station_id, station_name, location_lat, location_long FROM Monitoring_Station WHERE location_lat < 10 OR location_long > 20;

SELECT station_id, station_name FROM Monitoring_Station JOIN Water_Quality_Data ON Monitoring_Station.station_id = Water_Quality_Data.station_id WHERE Water_Quality_Data.ph_level > 6 AND Water_Quality_Data.turbidity < 0.5;
SELECT source_name, source_type, location_lat, location_long FROM Pollution_Sources WHERE source_type = 'Industrial' ORDER BY source_name LIMIT 10;
SELECT source_name, impact_type, impact_description FROM Pollution_Sources JOIN Pollution_Impact ON Pollution_Sources.source_id = Pollution_Impact.source_id ORDER BY impact_id DESC LIMIT 3;
